H0.text: Cutting is the manufacturing process used to permanently put parts together.

H1.text: Shaping is the manufacturing process used to permanently put parts together.

H2.text: Finishing is the manufacturing process used to permanently put parts together.

H3.text: Assembling is the manufacturing process used to permanently put parts together.

A4.text: Welding joins two pieces of metal using heat, pressure, or both.

A5.text: Welding also requires a form of shield to protect the filler metals or melted metals from being contaminated or oxidized.
